EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-10-05-Non-MQL Outreach - Weekly eBlast - 6.2 Highlight Reel.ES-20181005-
EmailTemplate.subject: Next-Gen Workload Automation for Hybrid Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/turbonomic-6-2-highlight-reel?utm_campaign=70157000001bY1yAAE]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
In this hybrid cloud world, your workloads could live anywhere, on-prem, on any cloud. How do you identify what's best and keep up with dynamic application demand while assuring performance and keeping in-budget? Manually, it's nearly impossible. Automation is key.
Watch this highlight reel <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/turbonomic-6-2-highlight-reel?utm_campaign=70157000001bY1yAAE]]> to see how our new features in Turbonomic 6.2 enable you to automatically optimize your entire infrastructure or register for our upcoming webinar on October 10th <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-eq/]]>to dive deeper on unlocking cloud elasticity and lowering your cloud bills. Regards, Megan
